title: Enumerations
question: Which of these are best stored as enums?
hint: Enums let you define fixed groups of items so you don't risk typos while using them.

correct.reason: There are only seven days in the week, so they make a great choice for enums.
There are only 12 months in the year, so they make a great choice for enums.
There are only a fixed number of errors you can issue, so they make a great choice for enums.
There are only so many named directions, so they make a great choice for enums.

correct.answer: Suits in a deck of cards.
correct.reason: There are only four suits in a deck of cards, so they make a great choice for enums.

wrong.reason: These are best stored as strings.
